Package com.intellij.util.concurrency

Class Invoker

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.intellij.util.concurrency.Invoker
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Disposable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Invoker.Background, Invoker.BackgroundThread, Invoker.EDT

    public abstract class Invoker
extends java.lang.Object
implements Disposable

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Invoker.Background 
      static class  Invoker.BackgroundThread
      Deprecated. 
      use Background(Disposable) instead
      static class  Invoker.EDT
      This class is the Invoker in the Event Dispatch Thread, which is the only one valid thread for this invoker.

      • isValidThread

        public boolean isValidThread()
        Returns true if the current thread allows to process a task.
        Returns:
        true if the current thread is valid, or false otherwise

      • compute

        public final <T> CancellablePromise<T> compute(java.util.function.Supplier<? extends T> task)
        Computes the specified task immediately if the current thread is valid, or asynchronously after all pending tasks have been processed.
        Parameters:
        task - a task to execute on the valid thread
        Returns:
        an object to control task processing

      • computeLater

        public final <T> CancellablePromise<T> computeLater(java.util.function.Supplier<? extends T> task)
        Computes the specified task asynchronously on the valid thread. Even if this method is called from the valid thread the specified task will still be deferred until all pending events have been processed.
        Parameters:
        task - a task to execute asynchronously on the valid thread
        Returns:
        an object to control task processing

      • computeLater

        public final <T> CancellablePromise<T> computeLater(java.util.function.Supplier<? extends T> task,
                                                    int delay)
        Computes the specified task on the valid thread after the specified delay.
        Parameters:
        task - a task to execute asynchronously on the valid thread
        delay - milliseconds for the initial delay
        Returns:
        an object to control task processing

      • invoke

        public final CancellablePromise<?> invoke(java.lang.Runnable task)
        Invokes the specified task immediately if the current thread is valid, or asynchronously after all pending tasks have been processed.
        Parameters:
        task - a task to execute on the valid thread
        Returns:
        an object to control task processing

      • invokeLater

        public final CancellablePromise<?> invokeLater(java.lang.Runnable task)
        Invokes the specified task asynchronously on the valid thread. Even if this method is called from the valid thread the specified task will still be deferred until all pending events have been processed.
        Parameters:
        task - a task to execute asynchronously on the valid thread
        Returns:
        an object to control task processing

      • invokeLater

                                               int delay)
        Invokes the specified task on the valid thread after the specified delay.
        Parameters:
        task - a task to execute asynchronously on the valid thread
        delay - milliseconds for the initial delay
        Returns:
        an object to control task processing

        public final int getTaskCount()
        Returns a workload of the task queue.
        Returns:
